entities.original: The package contains multiple entries with the same name. This practice has been banned. Try unzipping and re-zipping your add-on package and try again.
entities.machinery_original: The package contains multiple entries with the same name. This practice has been banned. Try unzipping and re-zipping your add-on package and try again.

project.name: AMO Linter
project.info: The add-ons linter is a tool that warns of potential problems within an extension’s code. Developers can use the web-ext command line tool to run the linter locally to check for potential issues during development, and addons.mozilla.org (AMO) uses it to validate an extension during the submission process. To request a new locale, please file a bug in Bugzilla using this template.

translation.string: El paquete contiene varias entradas con el mismo nombre. Esta accion ha sido baneada. Intente descromprimir y volver a comprimir su paquete complementario e intentelo de nuevo.

entities.original: Add-ons which are already signed will be re-signed when published on AMO. This will replace any existing signatures on the add-on.
entities.machinery_original: Add-ons which are already signed will be re-signed when published on AMO. This will replace any existing signatures on the add-on.

project.name: AMO Linter
project.info: The add-ons linter is a tool that warns of potential problems within an extension’s code. To request a new locale, please file a bug in Bugzilla using this template.

translation.string: Complementos que ya han sido firmados seran firmadosn de vuelta al ser publicados en AMO. Esto remplazara cualquier firma ya existente en el complemento.

entities.original: We do not allow coinminer scripts to be run inside WebExtensions. See https://github.com/mozilla/addons-linter/issues/1643 for more details.
entities.machinery_original: We do not allow coinminer scripts to be run inside WebExtensions. See https://github.com/mozilla/addons-linter/issues/1643 for more details.

translation.string: No permitimos que se ejecuten minas de criptomonedas dentro de WebExtensions. Mire: https://github.com/mozilla/addons-linter/issues/1643 para mas detalles.

entities.original: String names starting with @@ get translated to built-in constants (https://mzl.la/2BL9ZjE).
entities.machinery_original: String names starting with @@ get translated to built-in constants (https://mzl.la/2BL9ZjE).

translation.string: Nombres de cadenas que comienzan en @@ son traducidos a constantes integradas (https://mzl.la/2BL9ZjE).

entities.original: String name should only contain alpha-numeric characters, _ and @ (https://mzl.la/2Eztyi5).
entities.machinery_original: String name should only contain alpha-numeric characters, _ and @ (https://mzl.la/2Eztyi5).

translation.string: El nombre de la cadena solo debe contenerr caracteres alfanuméricos, _ y @ (https://mzl.la/2Eztyi5).
